name: Connected (sh1ft15)
description:
Update : For anyone that having problem running the game in the browser, there's Windows version for the build available below. I'll look into fixing this asap.

Submission for "Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1". This is the result of me trying to avoid overscoping but end up overscoping anyway. The game is pretty short and straightforward. There's nothing much to explain aside from the friend system. 

The phantom will spawn in various section of the game and will try to grab you. However, it'll stop a certain distance if you still have some of your friends online thus explain the theme 'Stronger Together'.  To keep you friends online, you need to send a random chat to attract their attentions.

Controls:
R - View Objective
T - View Phone (Left-Click to send random chat)
AD - Move around
E - Interact
